technical_analysis_workflow.overview: This sub-workflow provides an aggressive, thorough, and all-encompassing investigation process for technical analysis when creating GitHub issues. It employs methods from the issue-investigator mode to deeply analyze the codebase and formulate comprehensive technical solutions. This workflow is designed to produce scoped issues that can be used in automated fix workflows.

step.name: Create Investigation Plan
step.instructions: When technical analysis is requested, immediately create a comprehensive todo list to track the investigation progress.
step.tool_use: <update_todo_list> <todos> [ ] Extract keywords from the issue description [ ] Perform initial broad codebase search [ ] Analyze search results and identify key components [ ] Deep dive into relevant files and implementations [ ] Form initial hypothesis about the issue/feature [ ] Attempt to disprove hypothesis through further investigation [ ] Identify all affected files and dependencies [ ] Map out the complete implementation approach [ ] Document technical risks and edge cases [ ] Formulate comprehensive technical solution [ ] Create detailed acceptance criteria [ ] Prepare technical analysis summary </todos> </update_todo_list>

phase.name: keyword_extraction
phase.description: Extract all relevant keywords, concepts, and technical terms from the issue description. Be exhaustive - include function names, error messages, feature names, and related concepts.

actions.action: Extract error messages or specific symptoms
Note any mentioned file paths or components

phase.update_todo: Mark "Extract keywords from the issue description" as complete

phase.name: iterative_search
phase.description: Perform multiple rounds of codebase searches, starting broad and progressively narrowing based on findings. This is an aggressive, exhaustive search process.

iteration.title: Initial Broad Search
iteration.instructions:
Use codebase_search with all extracted keywords to get an overview of relevant code.
<codebase_search> <query>[Combined keywords from extraction phase]</query> </codebase_search>

iteration.title: Component Discovery
iteration.instructions: Based on initial results, identify key components and search for: - Related class/function definitions - Import statements and dependencies - Configuration files - Test files that might reveal expected behavior

iteration.title: Deep Implementation Search
iteration.instructions: Search for specific implementation details: - Error handling patterns - State management - API endpoints or routes - Database queries or models - UI components and their interactions

iteration.title: Edge Case and Integration Search
iteration.instructions: Look for: - Edge cases in the code - Integration points with other systems - Configuration options that affect behavior - Feature flags or conditional logic

phase.update_todo: Update search-related todos as each iteration completes

phase.name: file_analysis
phase.description: Thoroughly analyze all relevant files discovered during the search phase.

actions.action: Use list_code_definition_names to understand file structure
Read complete files to understand full context
Trace execution paths through the code

phase.documentation: Document findings including: - File paths and their purposes - Key functions and their responsibilities - Data flow through the system - External dependencies - Potential impact areas
phase.update_todo: Mark file analysis todos as complete

phase.name: hypothesis_formation
phase.description: Form a comprehensive hypothesis about the issue or feature implementation.

steps.step: Identify the most likely root cause
Trace the bug through the execution path
Determine why the current implementation fails

phase.name: hypothesis_validation
phase.description: Aggressively attempt to disprove the hypothesis by searching for contradictory evidence.

step.title: Search for Alternative Implementations
step.action: Look for similar features implemented differently
Check for deprecated code that might interfere

step.title: Configuration and Environment Check
step.action: Search for configuration that could change behavior

step.title: Test Case Analysis
step.action: Find existing tests that might contradict hypothesis
Look for test cases that reveal edge cases

step.title: Historical Context
step.action: Search for comments explaining design decisions
Look for TODO or FIXME comments related to the area

phase.outcome: If hypothesis is disproven, return to search phase with new insights. If hypothesis stands, proceed to solution formulation.

phase.name: solution_formulation
phase.description: Create a comprehensive technical solution with extreme detail.

component.name: implementation_plan
component.details: - Exact files to modify with line numbers - New files to create with full paths - Specific code changes required - Order of implementation steps - Migration strategy if needed

component.name: dependency_analysis
component.details: - All files that import affected code - API contracts that must be maintained - Database schema changes if any - Configuration changes required - Documentation updates needed

component.name: test_strategy
component.details: - Unit tests to add or modify - Integration tests required - Edge cases to test - Performance testing needs - Manual testing scenarios

component.name: risk_assessment
component.details: - Breaking changes identified - Performance implications - Security considerations - Backward compatibility issues - Rollback strategy

phase.name: acceptance_criteria
phase.description: Create extremely detailed acceptance criteria that can guide automated implementation.
phase.format:
Given [detailed context including system state] When [specific user or system action] Then [exact expected outcome] And [additional verifiable outcomes] But [what should NOT happen]
Include: - Specific UI changes with exact text/behavior - API response formats - Database state changes - Performance requirements - Error handling scenarios

guidelines.guideline: Each criterion must be independently testable
Include both positive and negative test cases
Specify exact error messages and codes

phase.update_todo: Mark acceptance criteria creation as complete

completion.final_todo_update: Mark all investigation todos as complete and update the main workflow todo list
